        public Task<{{POCOFullName}}> FindAfterId({{PK1Type}} id)
        {
            var data = query{{POCOName}}.FirstOrDefaultAsync(it => it.{{PK1}} == id);

        public Task<{{POCOFullName}}[]> FindAfterIds(params {{PK1Type}}[] id)
        {

                return Task.FromResult(new {{POCOFullName}}[0]);
